column1: #Text=Korra says : " Just ... stick close to me , okay ?
#Text=The spirits are so much more beautiful in their own world than they are at home .
#Text=Watch where you 're going , you giant clod !
#Text=" Meerkat spirit # 1 says : " This is a residential area , in case you had n't noticed .
#Text=Who do you think you are , stomping through here like that ?
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm trying to find the spirit portals ?
#Text=I opened one - " Meerkat spirit # 3 says : " I heard Unalaq did that !
#Text=" Korra says : " No , I did , but - " Meerkat spirit # 4 says : " Well if you opened it , how come you do n't know where it is ?
#Text=" Korra says : " B - because I was at the South Pole !
#Text=" Meerkat spirit # 5 says : " I do n't trust her .
#Text=" Meerkat spirit # 6 says : " Get out of our world !
#Text=" Meerkat spirit # 7 says : " We do n't need you !
#Text=" Meerkat spirit # 8 says : " You do n't belong here !
#Text=" Korra says : " Get away from me !
#Text=" Meerkat spirit # 1 says : " Did you guys see that ?!
#Text=She tried to bend at us , in our own holes !
